DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine whether blood level lithium sertraline affect different phase menstrual cycle whether effect psychiatric symptom . Subjects see two visit : one visit luteal phase one visit follicular phase menstrual cycle . On visit , fill depression , anxiety mania rating scale . Also visit 20mL blood sample drawn measure progesterone level either lithium sertraline level , depend medication patient take . The primary hypothesis study blood level lithium sertraline significantly low woman luteal phase menstrual cycle follicular phase . Examination also make whether symptoms increase severity luteal phase compare follicular phase . The investigator expect negative linear association symptom severity blood level , i.e . expect symptom severity worsen blood level lithium sertraline decrease .
DOC.brief_title: The Influence Menstrual Cycle Lithium Sertraline Blood Levels
